messages.message:
Seeing unexpected behavior when uploading files in converse via uploader drag/drop (in aihub-uat and aihub-sandbox)
• When dropping a file in uploader dialog, it still shows the purple background of the global uploader, which doesn't look right. I guess we should only show one?
• Dropping anywhere doesn't work when the dialog is open. Also the drop area of the uploader gets much smaller than it was initially which results in opening the document instead of uploading it.
In build the purple background doesn't appear but the uploader size gets smaller
